member.name: M:CVManager.Controllers.OffersController.Offers(System.String)
member.summary: Get all job offers that have selected text inside. If searchString is empty then it returns all offers.
member.param: Case sensitive fragment of job offer title
member.returns: All job offers that match search

member.name: M:CVManager.Controllers.OffersController.Offers(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get job offer with given id

member.name: M:CVManager.Controllers.OffersController.Post(CVManager.Models.ItemId)
member.summary: Get job offer with given id
member.param: Json with id parameter specifying job offer
